name: FartyMustache
description:
my name is Ahmed Eleawa I'm 16 years old and that is my first game on itch.io i've made this game in 12 hours only as a challenge to test my skills the game is completely free to download

but its not allowed to share this game in any games platform for the copyright reasons 

Rule 1: always have fun

Rule 2:read rule 1! ;)
